start_message_private: Hello %s ‚Äî I'm %s, a bot with some useful and fun commands for you. SourceCode: GitHub
start_message_group: Hello, I'm %s I have a lot of cool features. To find out more, click on the button below and start a conversation with me.
help_menu_message: Here are all my plugins. To find out more about the plugins, just click on their name.
config_menu_message: Settings ‚Äî Here are my settings for this group, to know more, click on the buttons below.
language_menu_mesage: Current language: %s %s Select below the language you want to use the bot.
language_changed_successfully: The language has been changed successfully.

afk.name: AFK
afk.help: AFK stands for: ‚Äúaway from keyboard‚Äù It is basically Internet slang to say that you are away. /afk (reason) ‚Äî Define yourself as away.

medias.name: Medias
medias.config: Medias settings To know more about the medias module, use /help in my private chat. To know more about each configuration, click on its name. These settings are for this group only, not for other groups or private chats.
medias.autoHelp: When enabled, this option allows you to download media from some social networks automatically when you send a link without needing the /dl command.
medias.captionHelp: When activated, this option sends the subtitles of the media you download using the bot.

stickers.name: Stickers
stickers.invalid_type: The file you replied to is not valid, reply to a valid sticker or video or photo.
stickers.kang_not_reply: You need to use this command by replying to a sticker or a video or a photo.
stickers.get_not_reply: You need to use this command by replying to a sticker or a video or a photo.
stickers.error: An error occurred while processing the sticker, try again later. If the problem persists, contact the developer.
stickers.help: /kang ‚Äî reply to a sticker to add it to your sticker pack created by me. Works with all types of stickers: static, video and animated. /getsticker ‚Äî reply to a sticker so I can send it to you as a .png or .gif file. Only works with static stickers or video stickers.
